channel.title: European Court of Human Rights on United-States-of-America.eu
channel.description: Recent content in European Court of Human Rights on United-States-of-America.eu

item.title: Requests for Interim Measures Sent to the European Court of Human Rights
item.description: Click on this link to visualize the original fax: 2023-12-20-requests-for-interim-meassures-2-faxes-submitted-to-ecthr_Redacted.pdf More detailed explanations can also be found in what explained to the European Court of Human Rights on December 15, 2023. On December 15, 2023, 2 faxes were submitted to the ECtHR. On December 20, 2023, 1 fax, containing 2 sets of requests, was submitted to the ECtHR. First Set of Requests for Interim Measures Submitted to the ECtHR RULE 39 - URGENT (1) Dear Honorable Judges of the European Court of Human Rights,

item.title: ECTHR submissions
item.description: First fax sent to the ECtHR on December 15, 2023 The first fax I sent, on December 15, 2023, to the European Court of Human Rights (ECtHR) has been heavily redacted but can nevertheless be viewed here: A_1_Binder1_submitted_by_fax_2023-12-15_Redacted.pdf The only thing the general public can view is that “In compliance with [REDACTED] I am asking the Court to keep this request for interim measures and related documents off public record.” Based on a phone conversation I had with an employee of the ECtHR, the Court accepted to seal the records pertaining to this case.

item.title: Request for anonymity - European Court of Human Rights - McDonald’s RICO case
item.description: Click on this link to visualize the original document: request_for_anonymity_2022-11-01_Redacted.pdf This request for anonymity was submitted to the European Court of Human Rights by fax to +33 390214350 on October 31, 2022, at 17:06:23 (GMT), or November 01, 2022, at 01:06 (am) Beijing time. My request for anonymity was approved by the European Court of Human Rights on November 02, 2022. However, I didn’t receive the notification by email they claim to have sent me on that day.

item.title: Request for interim measures - European Court of Human Rights - McDonald’s RICO case
item.description: Click on this link to visualize the original email: request_for_interim_measures_2022-10-31_Redacted.pdf This request for interim measures was submitted to the European Court of Human Rights by fax to +33 390214350 on October 31, 2022, at 15:09:09 (GMT), or 23:09 Beijing time. Click on this link to visualize the original email: request_for_interim_measures_2022-10-31_Redacted.pdf To gain a clearer understanding of the sequence of events in this case, I invite you to view a detailed timeline at the following link:
